src:
Rasa Syukur Fakhri Husaini Setelah Timnas Indonesia U-19 Kalahkan Timor Leste
07 Nov 2019, 00:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Poin penuh berhasil didapat Timnas Indonesia U-19 pada laga perdana Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Grup K. Bertanding melawan Timor Leste di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam WIB, Garuda Asia menang dengan skor 3-1.
Dua dari tiga gol kemenangan Timnas Indonesia U-19 dicetak oleh M. Fajar Fathur Rahman pada menit ke-2 dan 77. Sedangkan satu lagi tercipta via David Maulana (61').
Kemenangan tersebut sangat disyukuri oleh pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-19, Fakhri Husaini. Terlebih, laga perdana selalu sulit untuk dimainkan.
"Syukur alhamdulillah laga pertama dapat tiga poin. Pertandingan selalu tidak mudah untuk laga pertama, apalagi anak-anak usia 19 tahun. Mereka bisa mengatasi semua tekanan," ujar Fakhri usai laga.
"Faktor mental yang kami khawatirkan dan itu terlihat meskipun memang banyak catatan yang kami harus perbaiki. Ini supaya kami bisa bermain lebih baik lagi," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Gratitude Fakhri Husaini After Indonesian National Team U-19 Defeated Timor Leste
Nov 7 2019, 00:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Full points were successfully obtained by the Indonesian National Team U-19 in the inaugural match of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualifiers Group K. Competing against Timor Leste at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night WIB, Garuda Asia won with a score of 3-1.
Two of the three Indonesian National Team U-19 winning goals were scored by M. Fajar Fathur Rahman in the 2nd and 77th minutes. While the other one was created via David Maulana (61 ').
The victory was very grateful for the Indonesian U-19 national team coach, Fakhri Husaini. Moreover, the first match is always difficult to play.
"Thank God, the first fight got three points. The match is always not easy for the first fight, especially children aged 19 years. They can overcome all the pressure," Fakhri said after the match.
"The mental factor that we are worried about is visible even though there are indeed many records we have to improve. This is so we can play better," he added.
